features.name: Queue Management
features.description: Real-time queue system for managing customer flow, including joining, status tracking, and management interfaces.

features.name: Scheduling & Agenda
features.description: Calendar and appointment management system for professionals, including public booking and internal agenda.

features.name: Authentication & Profiles
features.description: User authentication, profile management, and role-based access control (Beauty/Brutal themes).

features.name: Financial & Reports
features.description: Financial tracking, commissions calculation, and performance reporting dashboards.
